data.title: Eugenio Maria de Hostos Charter School (EMHCS)
data.text:
Take the next step toward a degree that’s built around you.

We know you’re busy. As SUNY’s leading online institution, SUNY Empire offers over 850 online courses that will fit into your schedule. SUNY Empire will be your partner as you prepare to advance your career without missing a step.

Through SUNY Empire’s Community Partnership, all Eugenio Maria de Hostos Charter School members, their employees, retirees, and family members have access to:

Associate, bachelor’s and master’s degrees

Affordable college tuition

A flexible learning model that fits around your busy schedule

An accelerated path to degree completion

College credit for previous learning

$100 Better Together Scholarship and a waiver of the $50 orientation fee

*SUNY Empire is proud to support military aligned students. Additional benefits are available for NYS Veterans and their spouses. Please contact military.programs@sunyempire.edu or call 518-587-2100, ext. 2779 for more details.

They're not just in our classes – they help power our website. Cookies and similar tools allow us to better understand the experience of our visitors. By continuing to use this website, you consent to SUNY Empire State University's usage of cookies and similar technologies in accordance with the university's Privacy Notice and Cookies Policy.
